name: Oak Chest
description: It's huge. You might be able to carry it if you sheathed your sword.
It's about 2 feet in diameter. This would make a mouse very happy.
You've never seen this much cheese in one place...
onEat: You sheath your sword and begin to take bites out of the massive wheel of cheese. You get about half way through before you realize this was probably not a smart idea and decide to put down the unfinished half.
